title: Elite Gourmet ETO4524 45L Countertop Convection Toaster Oven, French Doors, Adjustable Temperature & Timer, Bake, Roast, Broil, Toast, Includes Baking Pan, Rack, Rotisserie, Stainless Steel
description: The Elite Gourmet ETO4524 is a 45L countertop convection toaster oven designed with French doors and multiple cooking options like baking, roasting, broiling, and toasting. It offers full size conventional oven power and a versatile build. Featuring multiple functions so you can roast, bake, toast, broil, toast, rotisserie & warm foods to perfection. This dual door convection oven will make you forget about your traditional oven altogether! Toast, bake, broil, roast, rotisserie & warm your way to delicious, hearty meals and decadent desserts - this oven can do it all! The very spacious interior boasts 4 rack positions so you can bake a 12" Pizza, roast a whole chicken, broil steaks, bake cakes & casseroles and more at the same time! With convection air and heating elements on top and bottom that can be independently turned on, a 60-minute timer, up to 450°F temperature adjustment and a function dial, this oven really has the versatility you've been waiting for. An interior light lets you see the cooking process without opening the doors and we’ve included essential accessories: baking pan & wire rack with pan & rack removal handle, rotisserie spit & spit removal tool and a crumb tray for easy cleanup. Don't miss out on this must-have addition to your kitchen.
